summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of MARC Glocal Next.js website brand guidelines implementation. All major brand requirements successfully implemented and functional.

design_issues.issue: Footer background color is rgb(29, 52, 47) instead of brand green colors

passed_tests: Hero section displays with correct Green 3 (#4E9141) background color
46 geometric shapes found in hero section (no stock market graphics)
8 section dividers with correct amber-800 (#92400E) color implementation
Careers section visible on homepage with 5 company values (Integrity, Excellence, Collaboration, Consumer Focus, Innovation)
Contact section shows all 8 office locations (Goa HQ, Delaware USA, Mumbai, Pune, Kolkata, Kochi, Indore, Ahmedabad)
Poppins font correctly implemented throughout the website
CTA buttons functional ('Explore Our Services', 'Learn About Us')
Contact page loads correctly with brand colors and form functionality
Media page loads correctly with news/press tabs and brand colors
Contact form fields work properly (name, email, message, submit)
All office locations displayed correctly on both homepage and contact page
